string.text: Zokhan's instinct: find the old notebook on one of the bandits
Zokhan has told me that one of the bandits dropped an old notebook during battle. I should find it.
Zokhan's instinct: check the coordinates
A set of coordinates for an area not far from here are mentioned in the notebook. Time to check it out.
Zokhan's instinct: wait until night
The coordinates have led me to a note that holds the time and area of a meeting with a certain stalker. I have to wait until night and check everything there.
Zokhan's instinct: go to the meeting with the unknown stalker
Whoever's behind this has appointed a meeting in the tunnel under the railroad embankment. I need to check that area. Perhaps I'll find out what the bandits were looking for.
Zokhan's instinct: speak to Zokhan

I underestimated the severity of the situation. Skull turned out wiser than I thought. He took a sum of money from me for some case and vanished into the dark. I need to warn Zokhan about what happened.
Zokhan's instinct: open the case
I need to find someone who can get this damn case open.
Zokhan's instinct: speak to Zokhan
The case is open. I need to show its contents to Zokhan.
Zokhan's instinct: collect Zokhan's debts
I need to retrieve the money from Zokhan.
Zokhan's instinct: examine the contents of the notebook
I found the notebook that Zokhan was talking about. I should read it to find out what else to do.
Zokhan's instinct: read the note
When I arrived at the designated coordinates, I discovered a note. I should read it.
Zokhan's instinct: return to Zokhan

I underestimated severity of the situation. The unknown stalker who organized the meeting turned out to be a bandit. He decided to take a sum of money from me; likely payment for a case that was in his possession. Good thing it didn't work out for him. I need to discuss this situation with Zokhan.
Zokhan's instinct: search the dead bandit

I underestimated the severity of the situation. The unknown stalker who organized the meeting turned out to be a bandit. He decided to take a sum of money from me, but fortunately, it didn't work out for him. I need to check his body.
Strange case: wait until the case is opened
Van has assured me that he'll try to open the case, although he'll need some time to do it.
Strange case: visit Van
I received a message from Van not long ago: “Beast, I've got some good news for you. When you have the time, come see me.”
Witch circle: jump into the anomaly
If Shilov's theory is true, the anomaly should teleport me into a predetermined area.
Witch circle: tell Shilov about recent events
Seems I'm alive, though I feel a strange sensation. I should go see Shilov.
Chain of events: figure out recent events
Chain of events: tell Shilov about recent events
Chain of events: answer the call
On the way to the farm, I saw the dead body of the guy in the tunnel. Everything is getting more incomprehensible and confusing.
Shit. My head is pounding. Seems I'm hearing some kind of voice, and it's calling me. I don't know how, but I know where it's calling me. I need to go there.
So that's where the voice came from: it was a controller. How the hell did it appear in the Cordon?…
Beast, I’ve got some good news for you. When you have the time, come see me. Van.
Merc, I’ve heard you’ve got some valuable information. Come pay me a visit. I’ll pay you well. Sidorovich.
Beast, there’s something I need to tell you. Come by when you can. Zokhan.
Patience

No matter how difficult or disturbing the situation may be, you always keep your cool. You plan every step ahead, no matter how small. In places where others panic, you display composure and confidence. This is the trait of a true leader.
Your reputation among the stalkers has significantly improved.
You have attained the Patience achievement.
Old notebook
A threadbare and seemingly unremarkable notebook. To read, click “Use.”
Note from Skull
A stalker’s note written on a sheet of paper torn out of a notebook. To read, click “Use.”
Metallic fireproof case
This case is relatively light despite its large size. I wonder what might be inside?
USB flash drive
A device used for storing computer data. Can be plugged in to a computer or any other device via USB port.
Document folder
These documents most likely contained reports of a massive arms shipment sent to the bandit base that took place about a month ago. The source of these weapons is unknown.
Skull
Bobby
